Name: MUSEUM VOLUME I
About the game: 'Museum' is a short Puzzle-Adventure saga. The games follow the Security Guard at The Royal Foyer Museum in England. As you wake up from a quick nap, you notice all the security cameras around the Museum have been powered off, it's up to You to get the cameras back online and solve the mysteries surrounding the Museum. 'Volume I' consists of 4 exhibits, each relating to Ancient Civilisations - Hellada (Ancient Greece), Ancient Egypt, Roma and an Aztec exhibit.
